overview: After a painful breakup, Alexis Crystal’s friends Jolee Love, Cherry Kiss, Anastasia Brokelyn and Vernica Leal have decided to take her on a much needed summer vacation to the paradise Costa Brava. Of course this isn’t any holiday, this is a holiday with Private girls… and you can be damn sure that there will be a whole lot of fucking! There’s only one way our beauties plan to help Alexis move on and that’s of course sex as they suck, fuck and show her what it means to be truly free and single. Anal, blowjobs, you name it, Costa Brava has the lot and you can see all the action right here in Private Gold, Love Beach, don’t miss it!
title: The Love Beach
